name: The Garden of Naturalsolution - Yeast Ferment Filtrate
description: The Garden of Naturalsolution Co., Ltd (Korea) offers Yeast Ferment Filtrate derived from Saccharomyces cerevisiae fermentation. This yeast-derived ingredient provides anti-aging, skin vitality, and microbiome-supporting benefits through beneficial metabolites and compounds from yeast fermentation.
notes: Korean supplier with expertise in fermentation technology. Yeast ferment filtrate provides stable form of probiotic benefits. Available through UL Prospector for global access. Filtrate form ensures product stability.
